cause.description:
Elevate the status of Tamil women globally. Equal rights in all specters of life. Our mission is for Tamil women found all across the world to stand on both feet, and become independent of men.
Help change policys, so equal rights well be a betterment for women in health, education, etc.
1. Empowerment of Tamil women
2. Equal rights
3. Change policies
cause.name: Empower Tamil women globally
